history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: Rbar_lt_locally. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rbar_lt_locally.

exceptions.tactic: pose proof (Rbar_lt_locally _ _ _ Hlt1 Hlt2) as [delta Hdelta].
exceptions.exn: In environment K : Ring Hlt1 : K Hlt2 : nat -> K Hy : nat The term "Hlt1" has type "Ring.sort K" while it is expected to have type "Rbar_lt ?a ?x".
The reference delta was not found in the current environment.

In environment H : forall (a b : Rbar) (x : R), Rbar_lt a x -> match b with | Finite y => x < y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end -> exists delta : posreal, forall y : R, Rabs (y - x) < delta -> Rbar_lt a y /\\ match b with | Finite y0 => y < y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end K : Ring Hlt1 : K Hlt2 : nat -> K Hy, m : nat Unable to unify "nat" with "sum_n_m (fun k : nat => mult Hlt1 (Hlt2 k)) Hy m = mult Hlt1 (sum_n_m Hlt2 Hy m)".
The reference Hdelta was not found in the current environment.

original: intros Hlt1 Hlt2 Hy. pose proof (Rbar_lt_locally _ _ _ Hlt1 Hlt2) as [delta Hdelta]. exists delta. intros y Hy'. apply Hy. apply Hdelta. auto.
